name: Mimikyu
author: You Iribi
flavor_text: Although it’s a quiet, lonely Pokémon, if you try to look at what’s under its rag, it will become agitated and resist violently.

attacks.name: Impersonation
attacks.effect: Discard a Supporter card from your hand. If you do, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack.

attacks.name: Mischievous Hands
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your opponent’s Pokémon and put 2 damage counters on each of them.
